Laser 101: Custom Wood Boxes w/ Lizzee.description: Students will create their own customized laser cut project learning how to use common software tools and techniques to safely operate the Protohaven Large Format Laser.

Multi Session Class Template - DO NOT D.description: We team up with Contemporary Art Platform Alma | Lewis and Inaugural Artist in Residence and Interdisciplinary Artist Marvin Touré, to bring you a special Mold Making + Resin workshop.

Template: Mold Making & Resin(Copied).description: This workshop will provide participants with a three hour introductory course on mold making and resin casting!

(draft)Sandblasting & Powder Coating wit.description: Gain the fundamental skills critical to get started sandblasting and powder coating with Karen Kocher!

(PRIVATE EVENT: J. Rolon) Laser Cutting.description: Happy Birthday Joshua! Cut your own unique, wearable works of art on our Large Format Laser Cutter machines using a variety of materials and design templates.

(PRIVATE) Team-Building Blacksmithing Wo.description: Learn to forge, finesse, and finish steel while crafting a hand-forged chain link as a team!

(Youth-77) Heat Press Basics/ Dye Sublim.description: Get to know the basics of vector drawing using Inkscape to design a custom graphic to print on a t-shirt. Next, you’ll learn how to use the CNC vinyl cutter and heat press to transfer your design onto shirts and other apparel! Learn the simple and highly-applicable process of dye sublimation printing while making your very own custom ceramic mug.

(Youth-77) MIG Welding Intensive.description: Let's make a table! Learn fundamental metalworking techniques in this welding intensive

(Youth-77) Mold Making & Resin.description: This workshop will provide participants with a three hour introductory course on mold making and resin casting!

(Youth-77) Sewing Machine Basics.description: Learn how to use a consumer sewing machine, while also learning how to mend and patch your jeans.

(Youth-77) Vector Design for CNC - Level.description: Learn basic vector skills for CNC as you make wall clocks on on the laser & vinyl cutter in this 4-week intensive.

(Youth-77) Welding Intensive working ses.description: Gain the fundamental skills critical to get started with MIG welding.

3D Modeling for CNC Level 1 (Catalyst Co.description: Learn basic 3D modeling and rapid prototyping skills for CNC in this 2-week intensive course with Reggie Raye.

3D Modeling for CNC Level 1 with Reggie.description: Learn basic 3D modeling and rapid prototyping skills for CNC in this 4-week intensive course with Reggie Raye.

3D Printing 101: Custom Lithophanes.description: Learn to cross a thousand year old art form with 3D printing to turn your digital photographs into beautiful display pieces.Students will get an introduction to 3D printing and learn how to setup and operate filament 3D printers, to download and print models, and learn how to turn their personal photographs into lithophanes.

4 Week Session Class Template - DO NOT D.description: We team up with Contemporary Art Platform Alma | Lewis and Inaugural Artist in Residence and Interdisciplinary Artist Marvin Touré, to bring you a special Mold Making + Resin workshop.

All Member Meeting.description: Join us in person at the shop for an All Member Meeting. Members of our Board and staff will be present, so you can get your voices heard and answered.

All Member Meeting (Virtual).description: Our second all-member meeting of 2023! Join us at the shop on April 21st, 2023 from 6-7pm to talk all things Protohaven and what to expect for 2023.

B*tch & St*tch Hand Embroidery Workshop.description: Join local fiber artist, Oriole Golding, for our B*tch & St*tch Hand Embroidery Workshop: a cathartic evening of stitching, stabbing, wine, and whining.

Basic Metal Skills & Equipment.description: Learn to operate our general metal working equipment.

Basic Metal Skills & Equipment w/ Jason.description: Learn to operate our general metal working equipment.

Blacksmithing 101: Campfire Cooking Tool.description: Love camping or outdoor cooking? This 2-session class will give you a taste of blacksmithing and general metalwork, allowing you to create your own set of skewers and s-hooks. Weather-permitting, the last class may end with a campfire cookout behind the shop!

Blacksmithing 101: Candy Canes.description: Learn to forge steel while making a candy cane ornament with local Blacksmith, Karen Kocher

Blacksmithing 101: Decorative Hooks.description: Learn to forge, finesse, and finish steel while crafting a hand forged, custom decorative steel hook in this blacksmithing intro with Karen Kocher!

CNC Embroidery.description: Ever try to embroider by hand? Wish you could bypass all the hand cramps and let a machine do it for you? Great news! This class can get you on the path to finally owning those custom embroidered towels you've always wanted

CNC Embroidery w/ Lola Brown.description: Ever try to embroider by hand? Wish you could bypass all the hand cramps and let a machine do it for you? Great news! This class can get you on the path to finally owning those  custom embroidered towels you've always wanted.

CNC Router Basics: Step Stool.description: Gain knowledge and hands on experience in designing for and working with the CNC router at Protohaven. As we learn the concepts to safely operate the machine and produce a step stool for you to keep.

CPR/First Aid/AED Training for Shop Tech.description: Please see event description for details.

Drawstring Bags: Sewing Machine Basics w.description: Learn how to use a consumer sewing machine while creating your own drawstring bag!

Edge Lit Acrylic Signs.description: Learn how to enhance laser engravings with electronics to make a striking programmable light display.

Framed Stained Glass - Protohaven x Pitt.description: We team up with the Pittsburgh Glass Center, to bring you a special 8-week framed stained glass workshop! (No previous experience required)

Giving Tuesday 2022.description: Join us on Giving Tuesday for an all hands on deck volunteer day!

Halloween Make-&-Take Party.description: Visit Protohaven - Pittsburgh's Largest Makerspace - for a day of creativity and fun! Enjoy hands-on activities for the whole family led by our team of talented makers!
